thread.section_title: Hotel ibis budget Meudon Paris Ouest - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Verry good
thread.title_full: Verry good - Review of Hotel ibis budget Meudon Paris Ouest, Meudon, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ä°dris D
title: Verry good
text: The ibis budget Paris Ouest (former Etap Hotel), the smart choice for accommodation! Choose to stay in an inviting, modern room when traveling. Each room is designed to accommodate 1, 2 or 3 people with a large double bed, a single bed, a shower, toilet and satellite TV - all at a very affordable price. A private paying undercover car park is also available, bookable in advance. Kick start your day with an unlimited breakfast buffet at a great price!
